verses.verse: In the beginning <S%H7225><s%> God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the earth <S%H776><s%> was formless <S%H8414><s%> and void, <S%H922><s%> and darkness <S%H2822><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the deep; <S%H8415><s%> and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was moving <S%H9550><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the waters. <S%H4325><s%>
Then God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let there be light <S%H216><s%>"; and there was light. <S%H216><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the light <S%H216><s%> was good; <S%H2896><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> separated <S%H914><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> from the darkness. <S%H2822><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and the darkness <S%H2822><s%> He called <S%H7121><s%> night. <S%H3915><s%> And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> one <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let there be an expanse <S%H7549><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and let it separate <S%H914><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> from the waters. <S%H4325><s%>"

And God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the expanse, <S%H7549><s%> and separated <S%H914><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were below <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the expanse <S%H7549><s%> from the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the expanse; <S%H7549><s%> and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the expanse <S%H7549><s%> heaven. <S%H8064><s%> And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> below <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be gathered <S%H9509><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> and let the dry <S%H3004><s%> land <S%H3004><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%>"; and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the dry <S%H3004><s%> land <S%H3004><s%> earth, <S%H776><s%> and the gathering <S%H9288><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> He called <S%H7121><s%> seas; <S%H3220><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the earth <S%H776><s%> sprout <S%H1876><s%> vegetation, <S%H1877><s%> plants <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> [and] fruit <S%H6529><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> bearing <S%H6213><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> with seed <S%H2233><s%> in them, on the earth <S%H776><s%>"; and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And the earth <S%H776><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> vegetation, <S%H1877><s%> plants <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and trees <S%H6086><s%> bearing <S%H6213><s%> fruit, <S%H6529><s%> with seed <S%H2233><s%> in them, after their kind; <S%H4327><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>
And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> a third <S%H7992><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let there be lights <S%H3974><s%> in the expanse <S%H7549><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> to separate <S%H914><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> from the night, <S%H3915><s%> and let them be for signs, <S%H226><s%> and for seasons, <S%H4150><s%> and for days <S%H3117><s%> and years; <S%H8141><s%>
and let them be for lights <S%H3974><s%> in the expanse <S%H7549><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> to give <S%H215><s%> light <S%H215><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> "; and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> lights, <S%H3974><s%> the greater <S%H1419><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to govern <S%H4475><s%> the day, <S%H3117><s%> and the lesser <S%H9512><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to govern <S%H4475><s%> the night; <S%H3915><s%> [He made] the stars <S%H3556><s%> also.
And God <S%H430><s%> placed <S%H5414><s%> them in the expanse <S%H7549><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> to give <S%H215><s%> light <S%H215><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%>

and to govern <S%H4910><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> and the night, <S%H3915><s%> and to separate <S%H914><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> from the darkness; <S%H2822><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>
And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> a fourth <S%H7243><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> teem <S%H8317><s%> with swarms <S%H8318><s%> of living <S%H2416><s%> creatures, <S%H5315><s%> and let birds <S%H5775><s%> fly <S%H5774><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> expanse <S%H7549><s%> of the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>"

And God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H8577><s%> monsters, <S%H8577><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moves, <S%H7430><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> swarmed <S%H8317><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> winged <S%H3671><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%> after its kind; <S%H4327><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> "Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and let birds <S%H5775><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"
And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the earth <S%H776><s%> bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creatures <S%H5315><s%> after their kind: <S%H4327><s%> cattle <S%H929><s%> and creeping <S%H7431><s%> things <S%H7431><s%> and beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>"; and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the cattle <S%H929><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and everything <S%H3605><s%> that creeps <S%H7431><s%> on the ground <S%H127><s%> after its kind; <S%H4327><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let Us make <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in Our image, <S%H6754><s%> according to Our likeness; <S%H1823><s%> and let them rule <S%H7287><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> and over the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> and over the cattle <S%H929><s%> and over all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and over every <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H7431><s%> thing <S%H7431><s%> that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

And God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in His own image, <S%H6754><s%> in the image <S%H6754><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> He created <S%H1254><s%> him; male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> He created <S%H1254><s%> them.

And God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them; and God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and subdue <S%H3533><s%> it; and rule <S%H7287><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> and over the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and over every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing <S%H2416><s%> that moves <S%H7430><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

Then God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you every <S%H3605><s%> plant <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> that is on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> which <S%H834><s%> has fruit <S%H6529><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed; <S%H2233><s%> it shall be food <S%H402><s%> for you;

and to every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and to every <S%H3605><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> and to every <S%H3605><s%> thing <S%H3605><s%> that moves <S%H7430><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> has life, <S%H5315><s%> <S%H9130><s%> [I have given] every <S%H3605><s%> green <S%H3418><s%> plant <S%H6212><s%> for food <S%H402><s%> "; and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that He had made, <S%H6213><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was very <S%H3966><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%> And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
